content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position(43, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 43, -82) with a current input of iron ore and output of iron plates.
- Stone Furnace (position 45, -82) with a warning indicating that the furnace source is full.

### New Stone Furnace at position(45, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 45, -82) with a current input of iron ore and output of iron plates.

### Copper Plate Mine at position(40, -84)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40, -84) currently working and extracting resources.
- Wooden Chest (position 39.5, -85.5) containing coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. Check the furnace status and current input levels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.
